column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I've been here a couple times and it's always a great experience.  The only issues you'll have here are truly first world problems: 1) everything is so delicious your favorite thing might be sold out if you come late in the day
column2: 2) this place is so good that it is deservedly popular so if you come early you may wait in line.  Solution: come early (with a book) on one day for your favorites
column3: then come later when they're not so busy and chat with the incredibly friendly staff - and learn something new!
